input.sentences: we took this picture in the inn we were staying while on our trip .
we saw a few castles | but did n't tour any of them .
we went to a historical church with relics one day .
the inn had a really comfortable balcony ; sometimes i napped there .
the sunsets could not have been more beautiful .
output.sentences: My wife and I enjoy looking at pictures we snapped, while staying at a local bed and breakfast.
We were on a tour that was specifically devoted to castles in the region.
On one day I think we visited seven castles and were up to our ears in history and relics.
The next day we skipped the morning tour and napped in till the early afternoon, in our comfortable Inn room.
One evening we ate at a restaurant beside a lake and enjoyed a beautiful sunset and a delicious meal.
